title: Unable to perform a count operation on a named query
body:
### Describe the bug

Panache count not working with named queries.

```
import io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.panache.PanacheEntity;
import javax.persistence.*;

@Entity
@Cacheable
@NamedQueries({
        @NamedQuery(name = "countFruit",
                query = "FROM Fruit")
})
public class Fruit extends PanacheEntity {

    @Column(length = 40, unique = true)
    public String name;


    public static long countFruits() {
        return count("#countFruit");   // This is not working
    }


    public static long countFruitsByFind() {
        return find("#countFruit").count();     // This is working
    }
}
```

### Expected behavior

The panache count query works with named queries.

### Actual behavior

**Stacktrace:**

```
2021-10-14 11:00:23,948 ERROR [org.acm.hib.orm.pan.FruitResource] (executor-thread-0) Failed to handle request: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: org.hibernate.QueryException: unexpected char: '#' [SELECT COUNT(*) FROM org.acme.hibernate.orm.panache.Fruit WHERE #countFruit]

	at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:181)
	at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:188)
	at org.hibernate.internal.AbstractSharedSessionContract.createQuery(AbstractSharedSessionContract.java:743)
	at org.hibernate.internal.AbstractSharedSessionContract.createQuery(AbstractSharedSessionContract.java:114)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.session.TransactionScopedSession.createQuery(TransactionScopedSession.java:345)

	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.panache.common.runtime.AbstractJpaOperations.count(AbstractJpaOperations.java:317)
	at org.acme.hibernate.orm.panache.Fruit.count(Fruit.java)
	at org.acme.hibernate.orm.panache.Fruit.countFruits(Fruit.java:19)
	at org.acme.hibernate.orm.panache.FruitResource.getCount(FruitResource.java:54)

	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.11" 

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.3.0.FINAL

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.6.3

### Additional information

_No response_
